reviewText:
Goods and contras: (+) Simple control. ✅
(+) Nice really old school design. ✅
(+) Short maps. ✅   (it’s positive because of the checkpoint system)
(+) Cheep, only 3,99€ without discount! ✅
(-) Short gameplay. ⍻  (it was only two hours for me.
(-) There is not settings menu for key-bind.  ⍻
Crash, bug, glitch:No. ✅  The game worked good, and I didn’t find any bug or glitch. ✅

My personally opinion:One of my old favourite game was a tank game with my old TV game device.
(Picture link here!)[i1166.photobucket.com]
When I saw this game on the Steam-Greenlight page, I know I will like it! And here it is! AND I LIKED IT! :D

Recommendation:I recommend this game to everyone whose like the;
Simple games.
Arcade game style with better graphics.
To the Achievement-Hunters:There are no achievements. You can play with it free! ✅
voteText: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful
